title: Citi ranks #1 in social media survey
summary: Investment information portal Assetinum.com analyzed the social media presence of the 50 leading global private banks, and Citi came out on top with a score of 84 out of 100. Citi has a strong presence across numerous channels, and we hope you will join the conversation here on the blog and through our other platforms. You can find us pretty much anywhere:
